Class Fighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayerCharacter
      • Fighter

  • public class Fighter
extends PlayerCharacter
    This guy hits things really hard. He also protects others from harm.
    Author:
    Matt Hendrick

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class PlayerCharacter

        armorValue, charName, constitution, currency, damage, dexterity, experience, health, intelligence, level, magic, nextLevel, strength, weaponDamage

      Initial stat chart for a level 1 fighter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This ability is meant to hit a target hard, but leave the fighter unable to act for a turn.
      void levelUp()
      This is the growth chart for the fighter

    • Method Detail

      • levelUp

        public void levelUp()
        This is the growth chart for the fighter
        Overrides:
        levelUp in class PlayerCharacter

      • focusStrike

        public void focusStrike()
        This ability is meant to hit a target hard, but leave the fighter unable to act for a turn. Strategically, it is meant to hit a threatening monster hard to get it out of battle ASAP.

      • shield

        public void shield()
        Raises defense at the cost of the opportunity to attack the next turn

      • taunt

        public void taunt()
        Draw the enemies to the fighter. This should have the effect of removing the priority from other characters, which would require an AI change if this is active.

      • whirlwind

        public void whirlwind()
        Hits surrounding enemies for normal melee damage.
